name: Namastech
tagline: Simplifying the Work and Offer the Best Tools
description:
Namastech is an integral computer services company, specialized in the outsourcing of computer departments and in the development of bespoke programs.
The firm was born with the desire to demystify and simplify the use of information technology, making it available to companies with the objective of making it a really useful tool to serve customers, taking advantage of and optimizing available resources and facilitating the work of their employees.
